name: 1 Block
description:
You randomly find yourself in a room with a single moveable block, an exit, and some sort of obstacle in the way, As you make your way through the exit you find yourself within another room. As you travel between rooms you slowly begin to regain your memory. Is there an end to these seemingly endless amount of rooms? Will you figure out what is actually going on?

The sticky notes are there just for lore and to gain some knowledge of what's going on.

When you complete the game, your score is sent to a google spreadsheet. It uses your steam username so if you don't have steam open it will leave the username blank. You can see how well you did in comparison to others here:  https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1fNnubB7qXvnmuBHjf5bpwNzZByLewG840BQ7HLAs...

Every asset beside 1 png (the sticky note) has been created by me.
